GK16visa04cu:7: vācyādadhikacamatkāriṇi vyaṅgyārthe dhvanyate 'sminniti vyutpattyā dhvanirnāmottamaṃ kāvyam
GK16visa04cu:11: dhvanyate 'sminniti--dhvanyate vyajyate vyaṅgyārthaḥ śabdādinā asmin kāvye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:17: (lo, i) lakṣaṇābhidhā ca mūle kāraṇer'thād vyaṅgyāt vyañjane yayoḥ /
GK16visa04cu:18: yasya dhvaneḥ vyaṅgyārtharūpopādhilakṣaṇābhidhāmūlatvena dvaividhyapratipādanām tadupādhikasya kāvyasya dvaividhyam /
GK16visa04cu:19: dhvaniśabdo hyanekārthaḥ, tathā hi dhvanyata iti dhvaniḥ, śabdādigatā śaktiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:26: atra hi vācyor'thaḥ svarūpaṃ prakāśayanneva vyaṅgyārthasya prakāśakaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:36: vācyatāvacchedakarūpeṇa tadvādhaḥṣa jahatsvārthāyāṃ tu arthayoreva bādhaḥ
GK16visa04cu:40: (lo, ī) anyaparamiti kārikāpadārtho vyaṅgyaniṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ, vyaṅgye niṣṭātātparyaṃ yasya vācyārthasya, etena guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyavacchedaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:41: atra hīti---ayamāśayaḥ, avivakṣitavācye lakṣyor'thaḥ svarūpaṃ prakāśayan vyaṅgyārthaṃ prakāśayati, tatra lakṣaṇāmūlā vyañjanā /
GK16visa04cu:50: (lo, u) saṃkamiti iti --- yogakākvādisāhāyyasūcanaṃ vācye iti
GK16visa04cu:60: atyantaṃ tiraskṛta iti---vācyārthasyāvacchedakāntareṇāpi avivakṣaṇāt atyantaṃ tiraskāraḥ,
GK16visa04cu:64: atra dvitīyakadalyādiśabdāḥ paunaruktyabhiyā sāmānyakadalyādirūpe mukhyārthe bādhitā jāḍyādiguṇaviśiṣṭakadalyādirūpamarthaṃ bodhayanti /
GK16visa04cu:68: camūrudṛśaḥ hariṇekṣaṇāyāḥ ūruyugaṃ bhuvanatritaye 'pi kasyāpi tulāṃ sādṛśyaṃ na bibharttotyarthaḥ
GK16visa04cu:69: tathā ca tena kasyāpi sādṛśyādhāraṇāt ko 'pi tadupamānaṃ na astītyatrāha---kadalīti /
GK16visa04cu:72: karirājasya hastiśreṣṭhasya karaḥ, suṇḍā, eṣu uddeśyeṣu dvitīyakadalyādipadānāṃ paunaruktyāt tadarthānāṃ vidheyatvāsambhavāt tāni padāni jāḍyādiviśiṣṭakadalyādiparāṇi /
GK16visa04cu:74: tataḥ kadalī jāḍyā karabho 'śobhanaḥ karirājakaraḥ karkaśa ityarthaḥ
GK16visa04cu:75: yatra punaḥ svārthaṃ sarvathā parityajannarthāntare pariṇamati, tatra mukhyārthasyātyantatiraskṛtatvādatyantatiraskṛtavācyatvam
GK16visa04cu:86: niḥ śvāsena andhaḥ ādarśa iva candramā na prakāśate na dīpyate /
GK16visa04cu:88: tathā ca niḥ śvāsena aprakāśa ādarśa ivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:89_0: nanu śakyatāvacchedakabhinnena aprakāśatvena rūpeṇa bodhanāt kathaṃ neyamarthāntarasakramitavācyalakṣaṇā ityata āha---andhatvāprakāśatvayoriti---śakyatāvacchedakaṃ
GK16visa04cu:89_1: sāmānyaṃ lakṣyatāvacchedakaṃ yadi tadviśeṣo bhavet tadā eva arthāntarasaṃkramiti vācyalakṣaṇā /
GK16visa04cu:90: yathā ghaṭapadasya nīlaghaṭapadatve atra tu lakṣyatāvacchedakamaprakāśatvameva sāmānyam /
GK16visa04cu:91: andhatvameva tadviśeṣa iti ato na tathā iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:92: idaṃ tu prāyikameva na sārvatrikaṃ “rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe “ityatra
GK16visa04cu:93: duḥ khasahiṣṇutvarāmatvayoḥ karabhaḥ karabhaḥ ityatra śobhārāhityakarabhatvayośca tathātvābhāvāt
GK16visa04cu:98: bhaṇa dhammia vīsattho, so suṇao ajja mārio deṇa /
GK16visa04cu:101: (vi, ca) bhama dhammia ityatrāpi viparīlakṣaṇābhramaṃ keṣāñcit nirasayitumāha---bhameti
GK16visa04cu:102: bhrama dhārmika viśvastaḥ sa śvādya māritastena /
GK16visa04cu:105: godāvarī nadī tattīre kuñje kṛtaṃketāyāḥ tatraiva pratidinaṃ puṣpāvacayanena tatsaṃketabhañjakaṃ svapoṣitakukkuropadraveṇāpi anivṛttaṃ dhārmikaṃ prati utkirayam /
GK16visa04cu:107: atra “bhrama dhārmika--” ityato bhramaṇasya vidhiḥ prakṛte
GK16visa04cu:110: yatra khalu vidhiniṣaidhāvutpatsyamānāveva niṣadhavidhyoḥ paryavasyatastatraiva tadavasaraḥ
GK16visa04cu:114: bādhitārthakatvāt nivṛttīcchayā uktavākyasya pravarttakatvānupapatteśca niṣedhe paryavasyatīti viparītalakṣaṇayeti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:116: taddaśāyāṃ kvacit vidhiḥ niṣedhe kvacit niṣedho vidhau paryavasyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:117: tatra taddaśāyāṃ vidheḥ niṣedhe paryavasānaṃ yathā--- aunnidṣaṃ daurbalyaṃ cintālasatvaṃ saniḥ śvasitam /
GK16visa04cu:118: mama mandabhāginyāḥ kṛte sakhi tvāmapi paribhavati //
GK16visa04cu:119: ityatra nāyikāyāḥ solluṇṭhavākye mama kṛte iti vidheḥ na mama kṛte iti lakṣaṇayā paryavasānam
GK16visa04cu:120_0: niṣedhasya vidhau paryavasānaṃ yathā---”mā pathika rātryandha śayyāyāmāvayornimaṅkṣāsi “iti svayaṃ dūtikāyā uktau svaśayyāyāṃ
GK16visa04cu:121_0: yattu niḥ śeṣacyutacandanamityādāvapi tadantikagamananiṣedhasya tadantikagamanavidhau lakṣaṇayā paryavasānamiti granthakṛtā
GK16visa04cu:121_1: pūrvamuktaṃ tanna ruciram, tatra bhrama dhārmika ityādāviva prathamaṃ vācyaniṣedhasyaiva bodhāt uttarakālamevādhamatvokteścyutanirmṛṣṭapadagrīṣmakālapulakakathanāt
GK16visa04cu:122: ata eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtā tatra tadantikagamanavidheḥ vyaṅgyatvamevoktam /
GK16visa04cu:127: yatra punaḥ prakaraṇādiparyālocanena vidhiniṣadhayorniṣedhavidhī avagamyete tatra dhvanitvameva
GK16visa04cu:130: (vi, ja) tatra dhvanitvameveti---vyaṅgyatvamevetyarthaḥ, na tu lakṣyatvamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:132: tadvat ihāpi prathamaṃ bhramaṇavidhiḥ śaktyaiva pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:133: paścādeva tasyāḥ kulaṭātvasya prakaraṇādinā pratītau bhramaṇaniṣedho vyañjanayaiva pratīyate, ityato 'tra viparītalakṣaṇāśaṅkā na kāryā
GK16visa04cu:141: yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ghoṣanivāsasya yathā vā “upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate “ityapakāriṇaṃ pratyuktvā upakārasya ca prathamameva bādhyatayā khyātiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:144: uttaratra abhidhaiva tu ityuktyā niṣedhavidhyostu vyaṅgyatvameveti darśitam /
GK16visa04cu:147: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti vyaṅgyārthasyāpyabhidhāne yatparatvena khyātasya bādhane 'pyabhidhāvyāpārasvīkārīt /
GK16visa04cu:149: atrādye mukhāyārthasyārthāntare saṃkramaṇaṃ praveśaḥ, na tu tirobhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:155: śakyatāvacchedakarūpeṇa bodhanamityarthaḥ , na tu tirobhāvaḥ natu abodhanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:156: ata eveti svārthaṃ svāśrayaśabdasya mukhyārthamajahatī upasthāpayantī ajahatsvārthā (rājadantādisamāsasiddha) naca kadalī kadalītyādau
GK16visa04cu:157: prathamakadalīpadenaiva sadalyā upasthitau tatra lakṣyārthasya jaḍatāyā abhedānvayasambhave kimarthaṃ kadalyaṃśe lakṣaṇeti vācyam,
GK16visa04cu:160: atyantatiraskṛtatvāt kenāpi rūpeṇābodhitatvāt jahatsvārthā, uktarūpaṃ svārthaṃ jahatī anupasthāpayantī
GK16visa04cu:167: asaṃlakṣyeti---vyaṅgyo yatra asaṃlakṣyakramaḥ apariceyajñānotpattikramaḥ, vācyajñānāntaraṃ vyaṅgyajñānaṃ jāyate iti kramo yatra apariceya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:179: eko 'pi bhedo 'nantatvāt saṃkhyeyastasya naiva yat // VisSd_4.5 //
GK16visa04cu:191: tathāhi---ekasyaiva “śṛṅgārasyaiko 'pi saṃbhogarūpo bhedaḥ parasparāliṅganādharapānacumbanādibhedāt pratyekaṃ ca
GK16visa04cu:194: (vi, ḍa) eko 'pi bheda ityādikaṃ vyācaṣṭe--eṣu ceti /
GK16visa04cu:207: sa hi prathamadhvaneranantaraṃ jāyate tadutpattikramaśca lakṣyate tat tulyo yo vyaṅgyastasya traividhyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---tasya śabdaśaktyudbhavatvena iti /
GK16visa04cu:209: na tu abhidhārūpā vṛttiḥ tayā vyaṅgyābodhanāt arthasya tadabhāvācca /
GK16visa04cu:210: tena sāmarthyaina udbhava utpannaviṣayatā yasya tādṛśavyaṅgyasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:211: tat traividhyāt tatsambandhena saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyanāmno dhvanikāvyasya traividhyamityarthaḥ
GK16visa04cu:222: (vi, ṇa) tatra kāvyasya śaktyutthatvaprayojakaṃ śabdaśaktyudbhavaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ dvidhā vibhajati---tatra vastvalaṅkārarūpatvāditi /
GK16visa04cu:223: pṛthak upādānāditi vastutvasya kevalānvayitvena alaṅkārasyāpi vastutvāt /
GK16visa04cu:228: alaṅkāraśabdasya puṃliṅgatvena tasya nañ tatpuruṣe liṅgatyāgābhāvāt /
GK16visa04cu:229: panthi a ! ṇa ettha sattharamatthi maṇaṃ pattharatthale gāme /
GK16visa04cu:230: uṇṇaa paoharaṃ pekkhia ūṇa jai vasati tā vasasu //
GK16visa04cu:240: atra sattharādiśabdaśaktyā yadyupabhogakṣamo 'si tadāssveti vastu vyajyate
GK16visa04cu:242: (vi, ta) panthia ṇa ettheti-- “pathika nātra strastaramasti manāk
GK16visa04cu:247: he pathika ! prastarasthale 'tra grāme manāk svalpamapi strastaraṃ śayanīyāstaraṇaṃ nāsti
GK16visa04cu:248: prastara evaṃ vayaṃ svamipa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:250: unnatamudbhūtaṃ payodharaṃ meghaṃ prekṣya gamanapratibandhāt yadi vastumicchasi tadā vasa iti āpātato bhāvārthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:256: tathā hi śayyāvirahāt prastarasthaṃ strījanaṃ puruṣo lātiratyarthaṃ gṛhṇāti iti prastarasthalaḥ tatra ityarthena uttuṅgastanadarśanena ca”
GK16visa04cu:258: alaṅkārarūpo yathā--”durgālaṅghitavigrahaḥ” ityādau (59 pṛdṛ) atra prākaraṇikasya umānāmamahādevī-vallabha-bhānudevanāma-nṛpatervarṇane
GK16visa04cu:259_0: dvitīyārthasūcitamaprāraṇikasya pārvatīvallabhasya varṇanamasambanaddhaṃ mā prasaṅkṣīditi īśvarabhānudevayorupamānopameyabhāvaḥ
GK16visa04cu:259_1: kalpyate tadatra umāvallabha umāvallabha ivetyupamālaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:263: dvitīyārthaḥ pārvatyādiḥ tena sūcitaṃ pārvatīvallabhasya varṇṇanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:266: ataḥ kaverīśvarabhānudavayorupamānopameyabhāve tātparyyāt upamānopameyabhāvaḥ kalpyate saṃvyajyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:276: he harṣada prabho ! samitaḥ yuddhāt prāptaurutkarṣairamitaḥ
GK16visa04cu:277: aparicchinnosi, utkarṣabāhulyāt tvaṃ kīdṛśaḥ asatāmahitaḥ śatruḥ sādhuyaśobhiḥ sahitaḥ
GK16visa04cu:285: hitena rahitaḥ kathaṃ tena yukta iti virodhaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:287: apiśabdasadbhāve”kupatimapi kalatravallabhamityādau apiśabdabalāt jhaṭiti viruddhārtha evābhāsate /
GK16visa04cu:289: amita ityādau tu aperabhāvāt prākaraṇikatayā prathamam aviruddhārtha eva pratibhāsate /
GK16visa04cu:290: anantaram amitaḥ sankathaṃ samiti iti virodhapratibhāsanād virodhābhāso vyaṅgya iti /
GK16visa04cu:291: apiśabdābhāvādityupalakṣaṇamaḥ anyeṣāmapi virodhabhidhāyi śabdānāmabhāve 'pi virodhābhāsasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ boddhavyam /
GK16visa04cu:294: (vi, dha) nanu vyaṅgyārtha eva āsvādyaḥ tasya śobhako yaḥ sa evālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:295: tathā ca upamādervyaṅgyatve pareṇa śobhyamāna eva saḥ na śobhakaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:298: śramaṇaḥ sanyāsī taddaśāyāṃ tasya brāhmaṇyābhāve 'pi yathā tasya daśāntarīyaṃ brāhmaṇyamādāya brāhmaṇatvamupacaryyate tathā vācyatādaśāyāmalaṅkāratvamādāya
GK16visa04cu:300: vastu vālaṅkṛtirvāpi dvidhārthaḥ sambhavī svataḥ // VisSd_4.7 //
GK16visa04cu:301: kaveḥ prauṭhoktisiddho vā tannibaddhasya veti ṣaṭ /
GK16visa04cu:306_1: dvādaśa vidhatvena dvādaśaprakāramarthaśaktyudbhavavyaṅgyadhvanikāvyamiti svataḥ sambhavī aucityād bahirapi sambhāvyamānaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:319: dṛṣṭiṃ he prativeśini ! kṣaṇamihāpyasmadgṛhe dāsyasi prāyeṇāsya śiśoḥ pitā na virasāḥ kaupīrapaḥ pāsyati /
GK16visa04cu:320: ekākinyapi yāmi satvaramitaḥ strotastamālākulaṃ nīrandhrāḥ tanumālikhantu jaraṭhacchedānalagranthayaḥ
GK16visa04cu:322: (vi, pa) svataḥ sambhavivastuvyaṅgyaṃ vastvāha--dṛṣṭiṃ he iti /
GK16visa04cu:323: nadījalānayanavartmani vane kṛtasaṃketāyāḥ kulaṭāyāḥ tajjalānayanacchalena jigamiṣorbhāvinakhakṣatasamvaraṇoktiriyam
GK16visa04cu:325: asya madīyasya śiśoḥ pitā kulaṭātvāt svapatitvenānuktiḥ /
GK16visa04cu:326: virasāḥ svādārahitāḥ kaupīḥ kūpasambandhinīḥ apaḥ jalībhiprāyeṇa ityanena mama bādhyādinā aśaktidine pibatītyuktam /
GK16visa04cu:330: atra svataḥ sambhavinā vastunā tat pratipādikāyā bhāvaparapuṣopayogajanakhakṣatādigopanarūpaṃ vastumātraṃ vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:332: (vi, pha) svataḥ sambhavineti---asya ślokārthasyānalīkatvena pramāṇāntareṇāpi gamyatvasambhavāt
GK16visa04cu:334: tasyāmeva raghoḥ pāṇḍyāḥ pratāpaṃ na viṣehire //
GK16visa04cu:335: atra svataḥ sambhavinā vastunā ravitejaso raghupratāpo 'dhika iti vyatirekālaṅkāro vyajyate
GK16visa04cu:343: atropamālaṅkāreṇa svataḥ sambhavinā vyañjakārthena baladevaḥ kṣaṇenaiva veṇudāriṇaḥ kṣayaṃ kariṣyatīti vastu vyajyate /
GK16visa04cu:346: āpatantam āgacchantam amuṃ veṇudārināmāsuraṃ rāmo balarāmaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:347: veṇudāriṇaḥ kṣayamiti balopamānasya siṃhasya veṇudāryupamānamātrasaṃkṣayakaritvena tadupamānopameyayorapi taddharmalābhāt /
GK16visa04cu:350: atra svataḥ sambhavinā virodhālaṅkāreṇādharo nirdaṣṭaḥ śatravo vyāpāditāśceti samuccayālaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:353: yo rājā yudhi nijādharaṃ nirdaśan arivadhūjanasya oṣṭharūpāṇi vidrumasya pravālasya dalāni ratakālīnagāḍhakāntadaśanakṣatavyathārūpāt saṃkaṭādāpado 'mocayat /
GK16visa04cu:354: yudhi krodhena svādharaṃ nirdaśya tatpatiṃ hatvā tathā cakāretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:355: atreti---adharadaṃśakatvādharadaṃśamocakatvayoḥ vastugatyā avirodhe 'pi āpatato virodhasya ābhāsamānatvāt virodhābhāsālaṅkāreṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:357: cakāradvayasya samaṃ śabdasya vābhāvāt vyaṅgyaeva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:361: tathā hyatra svādharanirdaṃśanaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ vairistrīṇām oṣṭānāṃ ca kāntadantakṣatamocanaṃ kāryabhūtaṃ samakālatayā nirdiṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:362: kiñcātra nirddaṃśanarūpakarapiśāco mamādharaṃ valirūpaṃ prāpyānyānadharān sukhinaḥ karotviti buddhvaiva nijādharaṃ daṣṭavāniti tasya rājñaḥ vuddhimapekṣya utprekṣā ca /
GK16visa04cu:371: atra vasantaḥ śarakāraḥ, kāmo dhanvī, yubatayo lakṣyam, puṣpāṇi śarā iti
GK16visa04cu:372: kaviprauḍhoktisiddhaṃ vastu prakāśībhavan madanavijṛmbhaṇarūpaṃ vastu vyanakti /
GK16visa04cu:382: śarasajjanasya varttamānatvāt aniṣpannatvena tanniṣpattyānantarameva tādṛśalakṣyaśate 'rpayituṃ prerayiṣyati iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:385: anaṅgaśarān kīdṛśān-navapallavapattalān navapallavaiḥ pattalā patraracanā yeṣāṃ tādṛśān
GK16visa04cu:387: vastuprakāśībhavaditi-- na ca surabhimāsādau śarakārādirūpakālaṅkāra eva prakāśībhavati ityato 'laṅkārasyaiva vyañjakatvamātreti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:388: surabhimāsādau śarakārādyabhedāprakāśāt kintu surabhimāsādau kharasajjanādereva prakāśāt /
GK16visa04cu:389: “rajanīṣu vimalabhānoḥ karajālena prakāśitaṃ vīra ! dhavalayati bhuvanamaṇḍalamakhilaṃ tava kītisaṃtatiḥ satam” //
GK16visa04cu:393: he vīravimalabhānoḥ nirmalakiraṇasya candrasya karajālena bhuvanamaṇḍalaṃ dhavalayatītyarthaḥ
GK16visa04cu:401: daśānanasya kirīṭebhyaḥ maṇivyājena maṇipatanacchalena rākṣasaśriyaḥ aśrubindavaḥ pṛthivyāṃ paryastāḥ patitāḥ /
GK16visa04cu:403: “dhammille navamallikāsamudayo haste sitāmbhoruhaṃ hāraḥ kaṇṭhataṭe payodharayuge śrīkhaṇḍalepo ghanaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:411: he trikaliṅgabhūmitilaka ! kaliṅgadeśabhūtrayātilaka ! eko 'pi tava kīrtirāśiḥ purandarapurīvāmabhruvāṃ surāṅganānāṃ vigrahe śarīre

GK16visa04cu:855_0: ābhāti” ityupasargasya “sakhi” iti praṇayasmāraṇasya “asi bhoḥ” iti sotprāsasya “kiṃ vā” ityuttarakṣadārḍhyasūcakasya vāśabdasya,
GK16visa04cu:861: na tu yat kiñcidviṣaye etad viśeṣaṇasya samāsapadaikadeśaḥ, kintu padasyāpi pade vyañjakatvamastīti darśitam /
GK16visa04cu:868: āṅupasargeṇa mithyātvarūpaṃ samyak pratibhāti iti bhāvabodhanāt vipralambhavyañjanam /

GK16visa04cu:897: aṅgāṅgitvarūpeṇa ekāśrayānupraveśarūpeṇa saṃdigdharūpeṇa ca trividhena saṃkareṇa yojane tasya trirūpatā /
GK16visa04cu:898: kimayam--ayaṃ veti saṃśayāspadatvarūpaḥ ekaḥ, tayoḥ parasparānugrāhakānugrāhyabhāvarūpo dvitīyaḥ, tayorekavyañjakena vyañjanarūpastṛtīyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:900: ebiryāḥ saṃkhyā bhavanti tā āhavedeti---”aṅkānāṃ vāmataḥ krama'; iti rītyāvedāścatvāraḥ tadvāme khaṃ śūnyam /
GK16visa04cu:905: ekasyaiva svajātīyena ekena svasvajātīyaiḥ pañcāśatā ca caturguṇane ekasyaiva caturadhikadviśatarūpatvam
GK16visa04cu:906: evaṃ taduttarasya pūrveṇa saha cāturvidhyaṃ pūrvagaṇanāyāṃ praviṣṭamityataḥ tasya cāturvidhyasya agaṇyatvāt tasya dviśatarūpatvam /
GK16visa04cu:907: evaṃ taduttarasya pūrvaddhābhyāṃ catuścaturvidhatvasya agaṇyatvāt caturnyūnadviśatarūpatvam
GK16visa04cu:908: evaṃ rītyā caramasya caturūpatvamātraṃ guṇyamiti bhavatyuktarūpā saṃkhyā /
GK16visa04cu:909: kāvyaprakāśe tu darśitakrameṇa kramaśo hrasamāvicāryya sarveṣāmeva caturadhikadviśatarūpatvena ekapañcāśata eva tādṛśasaṃkhyātvena
GK16visa04cu:911: vastutastu atyantavicāre vedakhāgniśararūpā yā saṃkhyā granthakṛtā darśitā sāpi na sambhavati
GK16visa04cu:912: tathā hi ekapañcāśata eva uktacāturvidhyaṃ na sambhavati,
GK16visa04cu:918: (lo, ū) tadevamiti---evaṃ vyaṅgyasya padavākyagatatveṅgavṛttau pañcatriṃśadbhedāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ
GK16visa04cu:920: rasasya padāṃśavarṇaracanāprabandhagatatvena catvāra iti militvā dhvanikāvyasya ekapañcaśadbhedāḥ śuddhā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:923: śuddhabhedānāmeva pañcāśataḥ sambhūya vedāścatvāraḥ, kha śūnyam,
GK16visa04cu:926: tathā hi prathamabhedasya sajātīyamiśraṇe catvāro bhedāḥ; vijātīyaiḥ pañcāśatā pratyekaṃ dhvaninā vimaśraṇe catvāro bhedāḥ iti militvā
GK16visa04cu:928: yadi prathamabhedasya dvitīyabhedena saha miśrayaṇaṃ; dvitīyabhedasya prathamabhedena saha tattadeveti /
GK16visa04cu:930: evaṃ tṛtīye 'ṣṭau caturthe dvādaśa iti krameṇānyeṣāmapi svakīyādyabhedāpekṣayā sarveṣāṃ bhedacatuṣṭayapātanam
GK16visa04cu:932: iṣavaḥ pañcabāṇāḥ; pañca agrayaḥ trayaḥ sāyakāḥ pañca evaṃ
GK16visa04cu:934: jratra agrimāgrimabhedasya yojane ekaikabhedahrāsāt evaṃ prakāreṇa evaṃ yojanaṃ bhavati /
GK16visa04cu:951: atra stanāveva pūrṇakumbhau, dṛṣṭaya eva navanīrajastraja iti rūpakadhvanirasadhvanyorekāśrayānupraveśaḥ saṅkaraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:958: tathā nistandra unnidraḥ candraḥ tādṛśavadanāyāḥ yad vadanāravindaṃ tasya saurabhyaṃ saugandhyaṃ tasya sauhṛdena saṃparkeṇa sagarvāḥ samīraṇā yatra tādṛśāni /
GK16visa04cu:959: atreti candrasya nidrābhāvāt tandrāpadasyāprakāśe lakṣaṇā samīraṇasyotkṛṣṭatvaṃ tadvyaṅgyam, tathā samīraṇasya garvābhāvāt utkṛṣṭe lakṣaṇā sukhasparśatvaṃ tadvyaṅgyam /
GK16visa04cu:963_0: alidhvanicandrasamīraṇaiḥ kāmoddīpakaiḥ vyaṅgyasya śṛṅgārasya apyatra pratītirityatastasya candrojjvalatvena samīraṇotkṛṣṭatvena
GK16visa04cu:963_1: tasya sukhasparśatvena ca lakṣaṇāmūlakavyaṅgye na prakarṣaṇādanugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvarupasaṃkaropyatraiva śloke bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:966: yathā--- khaṇapāhuṇiā deara jāāe kiṃ pide bhāṇiā /
GK16visa04cu:969: kṣaṇaprāghuṇikā devara jāyayā kimapi te bhaṇitā /
GK16visa04cu:972: gṛhapatiprasaktāmupanāyikāmutsave tadgṛhāgatāṃ tatpatnyā bhartsitāṃ paścāt gṛhe rudatīmanunetuṃ gṛhapatijyeṣṭhabhrātṛpatnyāḥ sopahāsoktiriyam
GK16visa04cu:973: atra kṣaṇa utsavastatra prāghuṇakā abhyāgatā utsavāgatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:974: taddevara sā te tava jāyayākimapyapriyaṃ bhaṇitā satī paścādvalabhīgṛhe roditīti /
GK16visa04cu:979: ayaṃ kiṃ svataḥ sambhavivastuvyaṅgyavastudhvaniḥ kiṃvā anunayapade
GK16visa04cu:998: bhedāstasyoditi iti--tasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyakāvyasya evamaṣṭavidhavyaṅgyabhedāt tasyāṣṭau bhedā uditā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1000: (lo, ṝ) evaṃ dhvanyākhyaṃ kāvyasya bhedaṃ nirupya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyamavatārayati atheti--tatra syāditi---kākkā ākṣiptaṃ vācyavat sphuṭīkṛtam /
GK16visa04cu:1012: (vi, ka) rasāderaṅgaṃ rasādi ityubhayatra ādipadāt bhāvādyaṅgatāpi rasādeḥ, evaṃ vācyāṅgatvamapi vastvalaṅkārayorityuktam /
GK16visa04cu:1013: ayaṃ sa iti---bhūriśravasaḥ samarapatitaṃ hastamādāya rudatyāstatpatnyā uraktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1016: rasatāpannasya tasya śṛṅgāreṇa prakarṣaṇāt pūrvānubhūtasukhasmaraṇe hi karuṇaprakarṣaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1018: (lo, ḷ) yathoddeśamudājihīrṣuritarāṅgamiti vivṛṇoti, itarasyārthāt pradhānabhūtasya rasādeḥ, rasaśabdenātra bhāvādīnāmupagrahaḥ ādiśabdena
GK16visa04cu:1021: ---idaṃ hi mahābhārate, samaracchinnaṃ bhūriśravaso hastamādāya tatkāntāyā vilapanam /
GK16visa04cu:1024: hā !hā! kathaṃ nu bhavato ripurājadhānīprāsādasaṃtatiṣu tiṣṭhati kāmilokaḥ
GK16visa04cu:1029: bhavato ripurājadhānīprasādasantatiṣu kathaṃ kamilokastiṣṭhati iti anvayaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1032: tādṛśasandiviśiṣṭānāṃ ripurājadhānīkāmilokānāṃ śocyāvasthājñāturvaktuḥ śokarūpaḥ karuṇo rājaviṣayaratibhāvasyāṅgamityarthaḥ
GK16visa04cu:1034: śokavyañjaka iti granthakṛto 'bhiprāyaḥ tadaiva vyaṅgyabhūtasya hāhāśabdapratipādyasya śokarūpakaruṇasya vyaṅgyatvopapatteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1040: “janasthāne bhrāntaṃ kanakamṛgatṛṣṇāndhitadhiyā vaco vaidehīti pratipadamudaśru pralapitam
GK16visa04cu:1041: kṛtālaṅkābharturvadanaparipāṭīṣu ghaṭanā māyāptaṃ rāmatvaṃ kuśalavasutā na
GK16visa04cu:1046: mayā rāmatvaṃ prāptaṃ rāmasadṛśo 'haṃ jāta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1048_0: mayā kanakarūpayā mṛgatṛṣṇayā marīcikāyāndhitadhiyā janānāṃ sthāne bhrāntam asāre saṃsāre kanakasyāpi tucchatvena tasyopādetvabhramajanakatvādupādeyajalabhramakanakamṛgṛṣṇayāndhitadhiyā
GK16visa04cu:1049: mayā vai iti sambodhya pratipadaṃ sthāne dehīti vacaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1050_0: mayā bharttuḥ īśvarasya paripāṭīṣu paricaryyāsu aṃlamityarthakā ghaṭanā na kṛtā tadvat rāmeṇāpi laṅkābharttuḥ rāvaṇasya vadanānāṃ
GK16visa04cu:1050_1: mukhānāṃ paripāṭyāṃ paripāṭanasya nimittamiṣughaṭanā kṛtā kintu kuśalaṃ dāridṣāpanāyakaṃ vasu dhanaṃ yasya tādṛśatā tu mayā
GK16visa04cu:1051: atra tuśabdena rāmavāk chedāt rāmeṇa tu kuśalavasutā prāptā ityarthaḥ
GK16visa04cu:1052: pratīyate--tatra ca kuśalavau sutau yasyāstādṛśī sītetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1054: (lo, e) aṅgaparipoṣakatvād vācyāṅgabhūtamanuraṇanarūpaṃ śabdaśaktimūlamudāharati-evaṃ ca rasabhāvāderaṅgaṃ rasabhāvādi, vācyasya cānuraṇanarūpaṃ vyaḍgyamiti dvidhetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1057: kanakaṃ prati mṛgatṛṣṇā viphalāśā, kanakamṛge tṛṣṇā ca vai niścitaṃ;
GK16visa04cu:1060: kābharttuḥ kutsitasvāminaḥ yad vadanaṃ tasya paripāṭīṣu paramparāsu laṅkābharttuḥ rāvaṇasya vadanānāṃ mukhānāṃ paripāṭyāṃ paṅktau iṣughaṭanā śarayogaśca /
GK16visa04cu:1061: kuśalam āyatiśuddhaṃ vasu dhanaṃ yasya evaṃbhūtatā, kuśalavau sutau yasyāḥ sā sītā ca /
GK16visa04cu:1067: prāptatatkāt rāmāt upamānād vailakṣaṇyarūpo vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ naño vācyaḥ
GK16visa04cu:1069: tadaṅgamiti manasikṛtya vyaṅgyasya sādṛśyasya agūḍhatvāt guṇībhūtatvamupapādayitumāha--atra rāmatvamiti /
GK16visa04cu:1077: yadyapi ekaśabdarūpaṃ sādṛśyaṃ śrotragrāhyameva na tu vākyaṃ,
GK16visa04cu:1079: tathāpi śabdasya sādṛśyatvena rūpeṇa vyaṅgyatvameva na śrotragrahyatvam /
GK16visa04cu:1082: na ca tad gopanāt agūḍharūpaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabheda evāyamiti vācyam
GK16visa04cu:1084: vācyārtho rāmavyatireko naño vācyaḥ, tatprakarṣānvayopapādakatayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1085: na tu rāmavyatirekasyānvayaniṣpādakatayā abādhitatvena tad vināpi tanniṣpatteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1089: tathā ca vyatirekālaṅkāraśarīraghaṭakameva sādṛśyam; kathaṃ tatprakarṣakamiti cenna /
GK16visa04cu:1090: ekaviśeṣaṇenāpi tad ghaṭanasambhave bahuviśeṣaṇasambhavāttatprakarṣakatvamapi labhyate tacca
GK16visa04cu:1092: (lo, ai) atreti vacane tu rāmo 'smītyuktvā punaḥ sādṛśyahetukatādātmyaropaṇaṃ janasthāna ityādi vacanapratipādanenāpi labhyam /
GK16visa04cu:1096: vyaṅgyamiti pāṭhe tu sugamā eva vyākhyā /
GK16visa04cu:1101: “mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopādduḥśāsanasya rudhiraṃ na
GK16visa04cu:1103: saṃcūrṇayāmi gadayā na suyodhanorūṃ sandhi karotu bhavatāṃ nṛpatiḥ paṇena”
GK16visa04cu:1104: atra mathnāmyevetyādivyaṅgyaṃ vācyasya niṣedhasya sahabhāvenaiva sthitam /
GK16visa04cu:1108: mathnāmīti---duryoghanena saha sandhikaraṇe pravṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ śrutvā kuddhasya bhīmasya sahadevaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa04cu:1109: bhavatāmityanena asmākam asamīhitakāritvāt nāsmākaṃ nṛpatiriti sūcitam /
GK16visa04cu:1113: tayā vyañjanayā aparanañor'thopasthāpanāt na mathnāmītyartho labhyate
GK16visa04cu:1125: (vi, ca) vācyasiddhyaṅgamudāharati---anupannasya vācyārthasya yad vyaṅgyānvayenaiva siddhiḥ tādṛśaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vācyasiddhyaṅgam /
GK16visa04cu:1128_0: anvayasāya vairikulasya vaṃśapadavācyasya veṇutvaropaṇarūpo vyaṅgaya iti kulaveṇudvayārthakasya vaṃśapadasya prakaraṇāt kule
GK16visa04cu:1128_1: niyantraṇena veṇo stad vyaṅgyatvena tadrūpaṇasyāpi vyaṅgyatvāt davānalatvāropasiddhyaṅgamiti kule davā nalavādhena veṇāveda
GK16visa04cu:1130: yadi prakaraṇavaśāt anekārthasya vaṃśapadasya prathamaṃ kulabodhakatvam; tadaiva veṇurūpor'tho vyaṅgyo bhavati tadeva tu na;
GK16visa04cu:1132: kintu kulaveṇyorubhayorekadā eva davānalānvayārthaṃ tātparyyād vaṃśayorupasthityā arthadvayameva vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1140: “iti atra hi rājamaṇḍalasya grāsakarūpasambandhitayā rāhuvādhāt bāhau
GK16visa04cu:1142: ata eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpi sadvaṃśamuktāmaṇirityatra rājño muktāmaṇyāropaṇasya satkule bādhāt satkule saha veṇuropaṇaṃ tatkāraṇamityuktam /
GK16visa04cu:1143: ato dīpayan rodasīrandhramityādikaṃ paramparitarūpakodāharaṇameva, na vācyasiddhyaṅgodāharaṇam
GK16visa04cu:1145: na hi dīpayan ityādau āhave jagaduddaṇḍetyādau ca ekasya vācyasiddhyaṅgatvamanyasya paramparitarūpakatvamityatravinigamakaṃ nāsti /
GK16visa04cu:1146: vācyasiddhyaṅgodāharaṇaṃ tu-- “gacchāmyacyuta ! darśanena bhavataḥ kiṃ tṛptirutpadyate kintvevaṃ vijanasthagrerhatajanaḥ sambhāvayatyanyathā /
GK16visa04cu:1150_0: pūrvārddhāmantraṇetyādivākyārthasya apratītikāle asiddhestad-vyaṅgyārthasya he acyuta ! madvidhanāyikādarśanenāpi dhairyyacyutarahita
GK16visa04cu:1150_1: ityevaṃvidhāyāḥ bhaṅgyāḥ pratītyaiva siddhayati na ca nṛpamaṇḍale candramaṇḍalāropaṇamapi vyaṅgyaṃ sadevālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1153: prathamaṃ nṛpamaṇḍale rāhoranvayāsambhāvena rājamaṇḍalapadādekadaiva nṛpacandramaṇaaḍalayoḥ upasthityā drayorapi vācyatvācca /
GK16visa04cu:1154: nanu tatkatham--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ praṇayaṃ mūrcchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16visa04cu:1155: maraṇaṃ ca jaladadabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām /
GK16visa04cu:1156: “ityatra viśeṣajale rūpetaṃ halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ bhujagarupaṇasiddhikṛdityuktyā halāhalasya vyaṅgyatvamuktvā kāvyaprakāśakṛtā vācyasiddhyaṅgodāharaṇatvena taduktamiti cenna /
GK16visa04cu:1157: tatra uddīpakatayā prākaraṇikamanekārthasya viṣaśabdasyārtho jalam ityato 'prākaraṇikaṃ halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyamityuktam /
GK16visa04cu:1158: na ca dīpayannityatrāpi prākaraṇikatvena vaṃśapadārthakulavācyaṃ veṇustu aprākaraṇiko vyaṅgya eveti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1159: davānalarūpaṇasyāpi tātparyyaviṣayatvena tasya kule bādhena tadupapādanatayā veṇorapi prākaraṇikatvāt
GK16visa04cu:1162: bhramimaratimityādau tu jalade bhujagarūpaṇaṃ śyāmatvenāpakāritvena ca jale halāhalarūpaṇaṃ vināpi āpātataḥ siddhatyeveti halāhalamaprākaraṇikamityato vyaṅgyameva /
GK16visa04cu:1163: parantu praṇidhāne sati jalasya bhujagajanyatvāsambhavena bhajagarūpaṇāsiddhyā tatsiddhikāritvena paścājjale halāhalarūpaṇamiti /
GK16visa04cu:1169: kiṃ vācyārthena kiṃ vā vyaṅgyārthena vyañjito 'yaṃ ityevaṃ sandehaviṣayatvaṃ tattvam /
GK16visa04cu:1170: halastviti kumārasambhave ākālike vasante jāte sarveṣāmeva kāmodreke sati halasyāpi kiñcit tathātvavarṇanamidam /
GK16visa04cu:1174: cumbanābhilāṣastu vyaṅgyaḥ taddvayamapi śṛṅgāranubhāvastat kena raso vyañjita iti sandehāt
GK16visa04cu:1175: na ca dvābhyāmeva vyajyatāṃ, tathā ca tulyaprādhānyodāharaṇameva
GK16visa04cu:1177: dhairyyaparivṛtteḥ kiñcittvena cumbanābhilāṣo jāto na vā; iti sandehena nadīyarasavyañjakatāyā api tadadhīnasandehāt ata eva vācyārthena tadvyañjanamapi saṃdigdhameva /
GK16visa04cu:1182: atra paraśurāmo rakṣaḥkulakṣayaṃ kariṣyatīti vyaṅgyasya vācyasya ca samaṃprādhānyam /
GK16visa04cu:1184: (vi, ja) tulyaprādhānyamāha---brāhmaṇeti---digvijaye paraśurāmaṃ jigīṣuṃ rāvaṇaṃ prati tadamātyasya tattrāsakavākyamidam /
GK16visa04cu:1185: bhavatāmeva bhūtaye na tu svārtha bravīmītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1196: paryyāptātvādaprastutapraśaṃsāvat parasparānapekṣayā camatkārāspadatvāt dvayorapi samaṃ prādhānyam
GK16visa04cu:1199: atrāllāvadīnākhye nṛpatau dānasāmādimantareṇa nānyaḥ praśamopāya iti vyaṅgyaṃ vyutpannānāmapi jhaṭityasphuṭam /
GK16visa04cu:1202: jhaṭityasphuṭamiti tat praśamopāyo nāstyeva iti hi vyaṅgyamāpātataḥ pratibhāti /
GK16visa04cu:1216: ahaṃ vratavatīti dharmopadeśinaḥ asya upabhogo mama vratabhaṅgāya no bhaviṣyatītyato 'haṃ vratavatyeva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1217: svairaṃ svacchandam ataḥ param uktena kiṃ prayojanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1225: prajjvālitasya rajanīṃ madanānalasya dhūmaṃ dadhat prakaṭalāñchanakaitavena” /
GK16visa04cu:1226: atra cumbīti pade vadanasaṃsargarūpasāyarthasyāsambhavāt saṃsargamātraṃ lakṣyaṃta tadatiśayaścābhidheyavat sphuṭaṃ pratīyate /
GK16visa04cu:1229: atra dattasaṃketaḥ jaścillatāgṛhaṃ praviṣṭa iti vyaṅgyāt “sīdantyaṅgani”
GK16visa04cu:1237: vānīrakuñje kṛtasaṃketāyā gṛhakarmavyāpārāt tatra gantumaśaktāyā vadhvā aṅgāvasādavarṇanamidam
GK16visa04cu:1238: atreti--praviṣṭa ityantamātraṃ na vyaṅgyaṃ vadhvāstatrāgamanasyāpi tadīyapakṣikolāhalaśravaṇādhīnāṅgāvasādena vyaṅgyatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:1240: camatkāra iti vadhvā vipralambhavyañjakatvena hyatra camatkāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1241: sa cātroddīpakaśakunikolāhalaśravaṇādhīnāvasādasya vipralambhaṃ vinā anyato 'sambhavāt tatpratītyavaśyambhāvena saṃketasthale vadhvā
GK16visa04cu:1243: vadhvā īdṛśakāryyatyāgenāpi tatrāgamanasambhavādṛte vācyāṅgāvasādamukhaprekṣatvena tasya nyūnacamatkāritetyarthaḥ
GK16visa04cu:1248: kiñca yo dīpakatulyayogitādiṣūpamādyalaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ sa guṇībhūtavyaṅgya eva /
GK16visa04cu:1252: tatparatvaṃ na kāvyasya nāsau mārgo dhvanermataḥ” //
GK16visa04cu:1260: alaṅkārāntarasyāpi pratītau satyāṃ yaccālaṅkārāntaraṃ bhasata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1263: yatreti pāṭhe tu yatra kāvye bhāsate ityalaṅkāra iti kartṛpadamadhyāhāryyam /
GK16visa04cu:1265: (lo, u) idānīmanyatrāpi vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāvasthale dhvanibhramaṃ nirasyan āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa04cu:1267: kāvyasya ca tatparatvaṃ na bhāsata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1270_0: (vi, ḍa) anyamapi guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprakāramāha yatreti---vyaṅgyārthasya gopanakṛtacārutve hi dhvanitvaṃ tad viparyyāso vyaktīkāraṇaṃ
GK16visa04cu:1272: “dṛṣṭyā keśava ! goparāgahṛtayā kiṃcinna dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tenātra skhalitāsmi
GK16visa04cu:1274: ekastvaṃ viṣameṣu khinnamanasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir- gopyevaṃ gaditaḥ saleśamavatādroṣṭhe harirvaściram” //
GK16visa04cu:1276: (vi, ḍha) dṛṣṭyeti---keśavaṃ dṛṣṭvā madanāndhatayā goṣṭe patitāyā gopyāḥ saleśaṃ saśleṣaṃ gadito hariściramavatāt /
GK16visa04cu:1277: dṛṣṭyetyādi--saśleṣoktiḥ tatra vācyārtho yathā---he keśava gavāṃ parāgeṇa rajasā hṛtayā naṣṭayā dṛṣṭyā mayā kiñcit na dṛṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:1280: he nātha ! patitāṃ māṃ kiṃ nālambase /
GK16visa04cu:1281: kathamālambiṣye ityatrāha---ekastvamiti---viṣameṣūñcanīceṣu vartmasu khinnamanasāṃ patnena klāntahṛdayānāṃ sarvābalānāṃ sakalabalarahitānāṃ
GK16visa04cu:1284: rāgeṇa tvayyanurāgeṇa hṛtayā dṛṣṭyā mayā kiñcinnijatiroṣādikaṃ na dṛṣṭam /
GK16visa04cu:1286: he nātha ! patitāṃ patibhāvaṃ bharttṛtvaṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase
GK16visa04cu:1288: yato viṣameṣuṇā pañceṣuṇā khinnamanasāṃ sarvāsām abalānāṃ tvameko gatiriti /
GK16visa04cu:1290: (lo, ū) dṛṣṭyeti---gavāṃ parāgeṇa rajasā hṛtayā tiraskṛtayā /
GK16visa04cu:1291: gāḥ indriyāṇi sambhāgadānādinā pātīti gopaḥ tasmin gope tvayi, rāgeṇa pramṇā hṛtayā vaśīkṛtayā skhalitā bhraṣṭapādā gatadhairyyā ca /
GK16visa04cu:1292: atha patitāṃ mārgapatitāṃ dhavatvaṃ ca nāvalambase na dhārayasi na parigṛhaṇāsi ca /
GK16visa04cu:1293: viṣameṣu uccanīcasthāneṣu, viṣameṣuḥ kāmaḥ tena ca khinnamanasām /
GK16visa04cu:1295: atra goparāgādiśabdānāṃ gope rāga ityādivyaṅgyārthānāṃ saleśamiti padena sphuṭatayāvabhāsaḥ
GK16visa04cu:1304: yatra vastvalaṅkārasādirūpavyaṅgyānāṃ rasābhyantare guṇībhāvastatra pradhānakṛta eva kāvyavyavahāraḥ
GK16visa04cu:1306: (vi, ta) kvacittu vyaṅgye guṇībhūte 'pi dhvanikāvyavyavahāra eva na
GK16visa04cu:1311_1: tatraivāṅgino vyañjakaviśeṣaṇatvenāṅgina eṣa camatkāritvāt dhvanivyavahārat yathā ca calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭimityatra madhukarakāmukarūpālaṅkārasya
GK16visa04cu:1311_2: vyaṅgyasya hatā iti vyañjakaviśeṣalabhyavyaṅgyavipralambhapratijanakatvāt nāparāṅgatvaṃ kintu vipralambhadhvanitvameva /
GK16visa04cu:1312: yathā--- “jāne kopaparāṅmukhī priyatamā svapne 'dya dṛṣṭā mayā mā māṃ saṃspṛśa pāṇineti rudatī gantuṃ pravṛttā tataḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1313: no yāvat parirabhya cāṭukaśatairāśvāsayāmi priyāṃ bhratastāvadahaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā nidrāharidrīkṛtaḥ”
GK16visa04cu:1314: ityatra vidhiṃ pratyasūyādhvanireva śaṭhapadena vyañjakaviśeṣeṇa vyaktaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1315: no yāvadāśvāsayāmi ityanena vyaṅgyasya vipralambhasya tu asūyājanakatvameva nāsūyāprakarṣakatvamityato nāparāṅgatvamityādi svayamūhyam /
GK16visa04cu:1318: pradhānena rasenaiva kāvyavyavahāro na tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyena /
GK16visa04cu:1319: tathā ca tatrottamakāvyatvameva ityarthaḥ yathā”ayaṃ sa
GK16visa04cu:1320: rasanotkarṣo”tyādaveva hi tatra śṛṅgārasya guṇībhāve 'pi taṃ bhāgamavalambya madhyamakāvyavyavahāro 'pi na karttavyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1329: kvacittu prakāraṇagmye vastuni tātparyyasattvena aṅgībhūtarasādau tātparyyābhāve 'pi āpātataścamatkāribhistairaṅgabhūtai rasādyaireva parāṅgavyavahāra ityāha /
GK16visa04cu:1335: sandhyābhramaṃ tādṛśaraśmisañcaraṇādeva sandhyākāle iti bhrāntiṃ prāpnuvatāmunmadānāṃ madanamattānāṃ pramadājanānāmanaṅganepathyavidhiṃ kāmasambhogaveśaṃ vidhatta ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1337: ityādau rasādīnāṃ nagarīvṛttāntādivastumātreṅgatvam, tatra teṣāmatātparyaviṣayatve 'pi taireva guṇībhūtaiḥ kāvyavyavahāraḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1339: (vi, dha) atra hi prakaraṇāt purāprakarṣe tātparyyasattvena anaṅganepathyavidhānavyaṅgyasya śṛṅgārasya tātparyyaviṣayatvābhāve 'pi
GK16visa04cu:1343: guṇapradhānabhāvāvabhāsastāvannānubhūyate, kālāntare tu prakaraṇādiparyālocanayā bhavannapyasau na kāvyavyavadeśaṃvyāhantumīśaḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1351: tatra āpātatastadananubhave 'pi uttarakālaṃ prakaraṇādiparyyālocanayā purīprakarṣaprādhānyāvagamo bhavannapi kāvyasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyapadeśaṃ vyāhantuṃ neśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1354: tathāca apradhānenāpi śṛṅgāreṇā'svādāt na guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyapadeśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1365: tanna, yadi hi avyaṅgyatvena vyaṅgyābhāvastadā tasya kāvyatvamapi nāstīti prāgevoktam /
GK16visa04cu:1371: saguṇāviti taiḥ kāvyalakṣaṇe kṛte vyaṅgyarasadvāreṇaiva ca saguṇatvena vyaṅgyābhāve saguṇatvābhāvāt kāvyatvaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1380: āsvādyavyaṅgyatve eva kāvayatvāṅgīkārāt idaṃ ca svakapolakalpitaṃ dūṣaṇam /
GK16visa04cu:1382: nanu āsvādye eva tāratamyānna prācīnadvayāntarbhāva ityata āha---yadi
GK16visa04cu:1385: astu tāvat kṣudratvaṃ tu kāvyatvāprayojakatvenānupādeyatvādanāsvādyatvameva ityāha---kṣudratāyāmiti---tathā ca dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyaṃ dvayameva
GK16visa04cu:1387: citrākhyaṃ padyaṃ na tu kāvyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1396: evamuktaprabandhena vyaṅgyasya pradhānaguṇabhāvābhyām ubha eva kāvye vyavasthite /
GK16visa04cu:1398: tatra kāvyavyavahārastu sādharmyād gauṇa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1403: nanu sarasatvameva kāvyasāmānyamiti nyāyasahastrairuktam; ucyate vakṣyate ca--tasya ca vyaṅgyasya
GK16visa04cu:1404: dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyau dvau bhedau, tayorapi pratyekaṃ vyaṅgyasya
GK16visa04cu:1405: vastvalaṅkārasarūpatvena traividhyamityuktaprakāreṇātmanā eva ātmano bhedaḥ prabhedaśca /
GK16visa04cu:1406: iti durupapādaḥ sāmānyalaśraṇaśca vyāpteḥ iti cet; atrocyate-yadi
GK16visa04cu:1407: vayaṃ rasavattvākhyasya kāvyasāmānyalakṣaṇasya vastvalaṅkāravyaṅgyayoḥ kāvyabhedayorabhāvaṃ brūmaḥ tadaiṣa
GK16visa04cu:1412: rasavadeva kāvyaṃ; tacca kvacit vastudhvaninā śavalaṃ
GK16visa04cu:1415: ata evāhuḥ---rasādyapekṣayā tu sarvaguṇābhāvavyabhicāra eva iti /
GK16visa04cu:1416_0: nanu tarhi kathaṃ niḥśeṣacyutacandanamityādau vastudhvaneḥ prādhānyaṃ, tatra hi dautyakarmajīvikāyāṃ kṛtaghnāyāṃ tvayi tasmin
GK16visa04cu:1416_1: adhame śaṭhe ca mama nāsūyā, kintu yadevaṃvidhāyāṃ tvayi viśvasimi, tathāvidhe ca tasmin anuraktāsmi, tadevaṃvañcanāsahastrajanitaprauḍhaparitāpāyāstu
GK16visa04cu:1420: nanvevamalaṃ yathākathañcit prādhānyamupakalpya vastvalaṅkārarūpayordhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyoḥ kāvyavyavahārapravarttakoktyā rasadhvanināpi sa nivarttatāmiti cet, atrāha
GK16visa04cu:1421: kāvyaprakāśakāraḥ---”samanantaroktaṃ yadyapi sa nāsti kaścidviṣaya iti /
GK16visa04cu:1422: pradhānaṃ cāpātamātreṇa āparyantaṃ pradhānena rasena eva vyapadeśaḥ”
GK16visa04cu:1424: tenaivoktamalaṅkāraprastāve---”rasādirūpastadvyaṅgyor'tholaṅkārāntaraṃ ca sarvatrāvyabhicārītyagaṇayitvā eva tadalaṅkārā udāhṛtāḥ” / iti /
GK16visa04cu:1428: yatra khalu samāsoktyādyalaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyasya vaiṣadyenāpi pratītiḥ,
GK16visa04cu:1434: iti kiñca kvacit kadācit yatrālaṅkāre vyaṅgyasyāsvādaprakarṣakatvena prādhānyamapi yathāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ---
GK16visa04cu:1435: “jaṃ vellihiṇa ma asi jaṃ cāsi paraviraṃ pilaghemaṃ /
GK16visa04cu:1436: tamaṇḍe kohali ajjaṃ valaṃ piphuli haṃsi” //
GK16visa04cu:1437_0: ityādāvacamatkāraiṇaḥ kuṇḍākarṣaṇārthāt prastutāt gṛhakarmaratyā yuvānaṃ prati nāyikāyā aprasaṅganiṣedhāya prastutasya bālāyā
GK16visa04cu:1437_1: yauvanodbhedakathanasya tasya dhvanau antarbhāvo 'stu, uktarītyā tasya mahāviṣayatvāt /
GK16visa04cu:1438: evaṃ cālaṅkāreṣu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyāntarbhāve eṣa eva nyāyaḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1439: kiñca dīpakatulyayogitādau yeyamupapādyālaṅkāṇṇāṃ pratītirna tatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyākāvyabhedāntaḥ pāto 'nāsvādyatvāt vyaṅgyasya, siṃ tvavarjanīyasannidhitvamātreṇāvasthiteḥ /
GK16visa04cu:1440: ata eva kavipratibhāsaṃrambhagocaratvaṃ teṣu nāstīti vācyam /
GK16visa04cu:1441: vānīrakuñje ityādau vyaṅgyasya nānāsvādyatvam, kintu vācyāpekṣayā āsvādapakarṣa iti teṣu ucito guṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyakāvyavyavahāraḥ /
